code: import{TOGGLEDESKTOP,TOGGLEMOBILE}from"../actions/toggleViewAction";var toggleViewReducer=function toggleViewReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:true;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case TOGGLEDESKTOP:return true;break;case TOGGLEMOBILE:return false;break;default:return state;}};export default toggleViewReducer;
